name: Ngoc Thi Pham Fund
description: The Pham Fund is an annual educational scholarship program for past, current, and future residents providing for school supplies, textbooks, tuition, and other education-related expenses.
fullDescription: The Pham Fund is an annual educational scholarship program for past, current, and future residents providing for school supplies, textbooks, tuition, and other education-related expenses.
whatTheyOffer: Pham Fund at Asian Women's Shelter, a pilot fund that is specifically designated for domestic violence survivors like her, and their children. It will be used to support them in seeking a vocational certificate or a college degree." Initial fundraising efforts raised over $3,000 for the Pham Fund, which will be disbursed to residents for school supplies, textbooks, tuition, and other education-related expenses. We are pleased to announce that the Pham Fund will continue as an annual scholarship
howToGetIt: All services are available by appointment. Call main line (415) 751-7110 for appointment. For crisis, please call 24/7 - (877) 751-0880
